title: alli nODalu rAma
sahitya:
allde summane illi hOde summane


caraNam 1    katha bAgilirisiha kaLLa mane idu mudadinda lOlADO suLLu mane 
idarAgi vaikuNTha vAsa mADuvantha padumanAbhana divya baduku mane
    caraNam 2    mAlige maneyendu necci keDalu bEDa kELayya harikathe shravaNangaLa 
nALema dUtaru bandeLedoivAga mALige mane sankaTa bAradayya
    caraNam 3    maDadi makkaLembo hambala ninagyAtakO kaDugobbu tanadali naDeyadiru 
oDeya shrI purandara viTTalana caraNava drDha bhaktiyali nI bhajiselo manuja
